parts.text: {"word":"nominare","priority":"☆☆☆","meanings":[{"part_of_speech":"verb","definition":"(ラテン語) 名前を付ける、指名する、任命する、告発する","english_definition":"(Latin) to name, to call by name; to nominate, to appoint; to accuse, to denounce.","examples":[{"sentence":"Eum consulem nominaverunt.","translation":"彼らは彼を執政官に任命した。","english_translation":"They appointed him as consul."},{"sentence":"Nominare aliquem heredem.","translation":"誰かを相続人に指名する。","english_translation":"To name someone as heir."},{"sentence":"Nominare reum.","translation":"被告を告発する。","english_translation":"To accuse the defendant."}],"collocations":["nominare aliquem consulem (誰かを執政官に任命する)","nominare heredem (相続人を指名する)","nominare reum (被告を告発する)"],"synonyms":["appellare","dicere","constituere","designare","accusare"],"antonyms":[]}],"etymology":{"value":"ラテン語の「nōmināre」に由来。これは「nōmen」（名前）から派生した動詞。印欧祖語の語根 *h₁nómn̥ に遡る。","priority":"★★★"},"pronunciation":{"ipa":"/noː.miˈnaː.re/","syllables":"no-mi-na-re"},"inflection":{"verb_forms":{"present_infinitive":"nominare","present_indicative":{"1st_person_singular":"nomino","2nd_person_singular":"nominas","3rd_person_singular":"nominat","1st_person_plural":"nominamus","2nd_person_plural":"nominatis","3rd_person_plural":"nominant"},"imperfect_indicative":{"1st_person_singular":"nominabam","2nd_person_singular":"nominabas","3rd_person_singular":"nominabat","1st_person_plural":"nominabamus","2nd_person_plural":"nominabatis","3rd_person_plural":"nominabant"},"future_indicative":{"1st_person_singular":"nominabo","2nd_person_singular":"nominabis","3rd_person_singular":"nominabit","1st_person_plural":"nominabimus","2nd_person_plural":"nominabitis","3rd_person_plural":"nominabunt"},"perfect_indicative":{"1st_person_singular":"nominavi","2nd_person_singular":"nominavisti","3rd_person_singular":"nominavit","1st_person_plural":"nominavimus","2nd_person_plural":"nominavistis","3rd_person_plural":"nominaverunt"},"pluperfect_indicative":{"1st_person_singular":"nominaveram","2nd_person_singular":"nominaveras","3rd_person_singular":"nominaverat","1st_person_plural":"nominaveramus","2nd_person_plural":"nominaveratis","3rd_person_plural":"nominaverant"},"future_perfect_indicative":{"1st_person_singular":"nominavero","2nd_person_singular":"nominaveris","3rd_person_singular":"nominaverit","1st_person_plural":"nominaverimus","2nd_person_plural":"nominaveritis","3rd_person_plural":"nominaverint"},"present_subjunctive":{"1st_person_singular":"nominem","2nd_person_singular":"nomines","3rd_person_singular":"nominet","1st_person_plural":"nominemus","2nd_person_plural":"nominetis","3rd_person_plural":"nominent"},"imperfect_subjunctive":{"1st_person_singular":"nominarem","2nd_person_singular":"nominares","3rd_person_singular":"nominaret","1st_person_plural":"nominaremus","2nd_person_plural":"nominaretis","3rd_person_plural":"nominarent"},"perfect_subjunctive":{"1st_person_singular":"nominaverim","2nd_person_singular":"nominaveris","3rd_person_singular":"nominaverit","1st_person_plural":"nominaverimus","2nd_person_plural":"nominaveritis","3rd_person_plural":"nominaverint"},"pluperfect_subjunctive":{"1st_person_singular":"nominavissem","2nd_person_singular":"nominavisses","3rd_person_singular":"nominavisset","1st_person_plural":"nominavissemus","2nd_person_plural":"nominavissetis","3rd_person_plural":"nominavissent"},"present_imperative":{"2nd_person_singular":"nomina","2nd_person_plural":"nominate"},"future_imperative":{"2nd_person_singular":"nominato","3rd_person_singular":"nominato","2nd_person_plural":"nominatote","3rd_person_plural":"nominanto"},"present_participle":"nominans","future_participle":"nominaturus","perfect_participle":"nominatus","gerund":"nominandum","gerundive":"nominandus"}}},"usage_notes":{"explanation":"「nominare」はラテン語の動詞で、様々な意味を持ちますが、基本的には「名前」に関連する概念を表します。人を役職に「任命する」、後継者として「指名する」、あるいは犯罪者として「告発する」など、文脈によって意味が異なります。派生語として英語の「nominate」があります。","priority":"★★☆"},"common_mistakes":{"examples":[]},"related_words":{"derivatives":["nomen (名前)","nominatio (任命、指名)","nominatus (任命された、指名された)","nominalis (名目上の)"],"related_languages":["英語: nominate","フランス語: nommer","イタリア語: nominare","スペイン語: nombrar"]},"level_frequency":{},"readability_explanation":{"level":"C2","text":"「Nominare」はラテン語の動詞であり、現代の英語話者には馴染みが薄いかもしれません。古典ラテン語のテキストを読む場合や、法律用語、歴史的な文脈で遭遇する可能性があります。関連する英語の単語「nominate」の意味を知っていれば、ある程度意味を推測できます。"},"example_sentences":[]}
